description: Lighter homemade sweet and sour sauce makes this healthier than takeaway but just as delicious and quick.
name: Tasty Sweet & Sour Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped into chunks
2 large red capsicums, chopped into chunks
3 cloves garlic, peeled and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the pork for 2-3 minutes, remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Heat the rest of the oil and cook the onions and capsicums for 3-4 minutes, add the garlic and chilli flakes and cook for 1 minute.

Stir in the ketchup, apple cider vinegar, soy sauce and pineapple chunks and juice plus half a can of water and cook for 1 minute or until bubbling. Add the pork back into the pan and cook for 5-6 minutes, until the pork cooked through and sauce is reduced.
